website_summaries.verdict: To keep up with the “dad shoe” pantheon, Adidas  introduces the Adidas Yung-1 which resurrected from the graves of the Falcon Dorf. This elevated, low-top sneaker is a functional streetwear component for almost everyone.The Yung-1 is a cheaper alternative to the Yeezys. Its colorway options are frequently updated, allowing numerous opportunities for sneakerheads to collect a pair. It is comfortable, lightweight, stylish, and versatile.
pros: More than 95% of all the users treat the Adidas Yung-1 with high acclaim regarding its style and unique design
A massive portion of the Yung-1’s fanbase is extremely satisfied with its exceptional all-day comfort
Several customers commend the brilliant use of color palettes, which made the Yung-1 stand out more among other sneaker iterations
According to a couple of users, the Yung-1 is a durable sneaker
A handful of reviewers praise the exquisite use of high-quality materials, which are intricately done in detail
A good number of purchasers describe the Adidas Yung-1 as a product with a very reasonable price considering its design and makeover
A few wearers receive lots of compliments while wearing them and strangers often give second looks to marvel at its beauty
Less than a handful of owners applaud the sneaker’s shape and structure
The convenient thing about the Adidas Yung-1 shoes is its versatility with all forms of outfits, some customers have expressed
Despite its bulky appearance, the Adidas Yung-1 is surprisingly lightweight according to few reviewers
cons: According to very few users, the colors used on the upper would sometimes stain or bleed into the other parts
It is a sneaker that is hard to keep clean, a handful of buyers have stated

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever had. I’ve bought other brands before and they’re either too tight or not enough arch support. I have a wide foot and these feel perfect on me. They’re great for walking/standing. I’m very happy with the comfortable roomy feel. If this review helped you in any way please let amazon know by clicking in ‘helpful.’ Feel free to ask any questions!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: They Aren't what i expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a little wide and a bit longer than the 9.5 I'm used to. I don't like that i had to look at these hard to like them while walking and taking pictures of them on my feet. The material feels "alright" but it could of been better honestly. I had high expectations but i was disappointed. UPDATE 3/Feb/2020 I ended up liking this shoe But the down fall is, when the red it wet it runs red all over the white parts of the shoes which is difficult to clean won't reccomend you wearing these if it's raining or was Raining.
customer_reviews.author: Zoran C.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy toe box
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe but it was too big. They are men's shoes so had to convert to women's size and it was off. Probably should've ordered a half size smaller for my size. (I wear 8/8.5 women) . I usually order 8.5 in sneaker but there was way too much space in toe area (top to bottom) to fit comfortably and be stable. Width was fine. Returned same day it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: A Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: They are good looking sneakers if you like colors
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 pairs of this style in different colors size 13 , my foot is wide they fit perfect very comfy and I love the style and looks and fit all good .
customer_reviews.author: lawrence jaspon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great but must order 1/2 size less than actual size for a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Good colors, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Nice colors. The orange was a bit more neon colored than the pictures described it. Pretty comfortable, although the lip is a bit cramped. I wouldn't run in these but they are perfectly good for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Came with box and shoes are brand new. Good deal
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful shoe! Shipping was fast, shoe fits as expected!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: App credt
customer_reviews.text: How do I get the $25 credit for using the app to buy the sneakers Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yassss
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect shoe for #hotgirlsummer. I got so many compliments and wore it with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Hannah James

customer_reviews.title: Shop your true size
customer_reviews.text: Chops your real size, some people talked me about buying half my size, in this case 10.5, it fits but no how i like, would preferred an 11
customer_reviews.author: Jose David Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Popping
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoes but they are POPPING every time I push off. Do something about it
customer_reviews.author: Israfil555

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit, and how they look, great purchase
customer_reviews.author: María Teresa jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Shoes to big
customer_reviews.text: Going to send shoes back to the seller for replacement shoe size or shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Cabello Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow Adidas!!! I am so disappointed. The shoes feel bulky, have no arch support, are too narrow, and are of poor quality. The shoe is falling apart already and I've had it for a short period. Not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: gabrielius
